Name: Name
Agree_with:
By continuing, you agree to the Optoma product/service’s <1>terms and conditions.
Please read and be aware of our <2>privacy policy and <3>cookie policy.
Welcome_content: Sign in to your Optoma Account, and get the most out of all the Optoma services you use. Your account helps you do more by personalizing your Optoma experience and offering easy access to your most important information from anywhere.
Check_registration_email_content: Registration requested successfully, please check your email to complete registration. If you cannot find the email, please check your spam folder.
Account_not_verified_content: Your email account was not verified, please check the activation link sent to your email{{email}}. If you cannot find the email, please check your spam folder.
Please_check_your_email_to_reset_your_pa: Please check your email to reset your password.
The_email_or_password_you_have_provided_: The email or password you have provided is incorrect, please try again
Delete_account_content_other: Are you sure to delete account? Please note that there's no option to restore the account and its data once deleted.
Delete_account_content_owner: Your are My account owner, deleting your account will include deleting all of the user accounts under your owner account. All of these accounts won't be able to use Optoma services any more.
Delete_account_content_power_user: Deleting the user will delete all OMS data and devices associated. Do you want to transfer data first?
Do_you_want_to_transfer_ownership_first: Do you want to transfer ownership first?
OMS_data_can_only_be_transferred: OMS data can only be transferred to Admin or a user in the same role.
Please_login_again: Your user account is now activated, please login again.
Please_login_from_apps: Your user account is now activated, please login from the app.
Please_login_from_your_windows_app_or_lo: Your user account is now activated, please login from your windows app or login here to OMS website.
You_have_made_a_choice: You have made a choice, no need to do it again
To_create_an_admin_account_of_Optoma_acc: To create an admin account of Optoma My Account platform, tap “Create admin”. To create a user account, please contact your administrator.
Upgrade_oss_content: Your OSS subscription has reached its limit, upgrade to the OSS professional plan to gain access to more functions, storage and users.
Expired_oss_content: Your subscription has automatically downgraded to the free plan until your payment details are updated.
Enter_serial_number_content_1: Make sure that your device has network connectivity and the date and time settings are correct.
Enter_serial_number_content_2: Open device's OMS page (IFP: Settings>Device>OMS, Projector: Settings>OMS) and enter the serial number assigned to the device.
Confirm_the_pin_code_on_the_device: Confirm the PIN Code to the device you want to register.
Importing_users_content: Importing users saves you time when you want to create accounts in bulk. Please download the template and fill in the relevant information.
New_password_is_the_same_as_old_password: New password is the same as old password
At_least_a_to_b_characters: At least {{min}} characters long but less than {{max}}
Please_fill_in_your_new_password_twice: Please fill in your new password twice.
You_can_login_with_new_password_now: You can login with a new password now.
Are_you_sure_to_delete_the_user: Are you sure you want to delete {{user}}? When you delete {{account}}, {{account}} and all associated data will be deleted.
Verification_letter_resend_successfully: Verification letter resent successfully, please check your email to complete registration.
Activation_letter_resend_successfully: Activation letter resent successfully, please check your email to complete registration.
Account_unverified_any_changes_will_be_a: Account not verified, any changes will be applied when the account is verified.
Open_devices_OAM_app_and_enter_the_seria: Open device's OMS app and enter the serial number.
Transfer_ownership_content: There's only one owner in My Account, the new owner will have full rights. Transfer My account ownership and OMS data to {{username}}?
Plan_will_downgrade_to_standard_plan: Plan will be downgraded to Standard on your next billing date.
Cancel_subscription_content: Are you sure you want to cancel subscription? All data related to Advanced plan will be deleted at the end of billing period.
Why_you_are_leaving: Before canceling, let us know why you're leaving.
I_do_not_need_this_service: I don't need this service anymore
Google_account_conflict: Google Drive and Google Classroom should pair to the same Google account
3rd_party_account_note: Users are hereby notified of recent updates to our Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy. Kindly review and agree to these changes to initiate your use of our services.
We_need_more_info_to_access_OMS_service: We need more info to access OMS service
For_precise_and_tailored_assistance: For precise and tailored assistance, kindly complete the following information during your first login.
Required_fields_missing_content: Some users couldn't be imported due to missing information in the required fields, please double-check the file.
Please_send_me_Optoma_marketing_messages: Please send me Optoma marketing messages for new products, services, promotions and events.
Password_must_have_at_least_one_uppercas: Password must have at least one uppercase letter
Password_must_have_at_least_one_lowercas: Password must have at least one lowercase letter
Password_must_have_at_least_one_number: Password must have at least one number
Password_must_have_at_least_one_special_: Password must have at least one special character
This_user_is_not_created_by_you: This user is not created by you, you don't have permission to change their role.
Unpairing_google_drive_also_unpairs_goog: Unpairing Google Drive also unpairs Google Classroom. Unpair?
Unpairing_oogle_classroom_also_unpairs_g: Unpairing Google Classroom also unpairs Google Drive. Unpair?
Only_alphabets_allowed: Alphabets and numbers allowed, no special characters.
Verification_link_expired_content: Looks like the verification link you clicked on expired.
If_you_want_to_assign_power_user_to_OMS: If you want to assign Power user to OMS, please assign Power user to My Account first.
AgreementContent1: We wish to advise you of changes to Optoma Management Suite (“{OMS}”) and Whiteboard (“{WB}”). These changes have been made as we strive to continuously improve our product and services to provide an excellent customer experience.
AgreementContent2: The below changes are effective from {EffectiveDate} and are summarised as follows:
AgreementContent3: Whiteboard will be under the new structure of Optoma Solution Suite (“{OSS}”);
AgreementContent4: Existing users of OMS and Whiteboard will need to login through Optoma Account Management (“{MyAccount}”) which provides a single sign-on feature;
AgreementContent5: {Old_agree_terms}, {Old_agree_privacy_policy} and {Old_agree_cookie_policy} of OMS will be replaced by new {Agree_terms}, {Agree_privacy_policy} and {Agree_cookie_policy} of My Account; and
AgreementContent6: {Old_agree_terms}, {Old_agree_privacy_policy} and {Old_agree_cookie_policy} of Whiteboard will be replaced by new {Agree_terms}, {Agree_privacy_policy} and {Agree_cookie_policy} of My Account.
AgreementContent8: Please obtain the relevant parental consent
AgreementContent9: {AgreementContent7}: We are committed to protecting personal information (including the personal data of children). We understand that minors (students) may be invited by Educational Institutions such as yourselves, to use our products and/or services, and as such our updated terms and conditions have been set as a requirement {AgreementContent8} before inviting and processing students’ data on or through our platform. We recommend that you review our Direct Notice and Sample Verifiable Consent Form. Should you not have the required consent in line with local regulations, you must not invite or allow your students to continue to use our products and services for which you will be accountale. If consent requirement is not met or there is any non-compliance with our updated terms and conditions, we have the right to suspend, terminate and/or delete relevant accounts.
AgreementContent10: By tapping the Agree button below, you confirm you have read and agreed to the changes and information detailed in this notice. If you no longer wish to continue under these new {Agree_terms} and {Agree_privacy_policy}, you are not required to take any action but you will no longer be able to continue using My Account, OMS, Whiteboard and OSS after the effective date.
AgreementContent11: As always, we appreciate you using our products and services.
Activation_link_expired_content: Looks like the activation link you received has expired. To proceed with account activation, please contact the platform administrator again.
Update_your_organization_name_and_type: Update your organization name and type
Reach_limit_oms_plan: You have reached the limit of your OMS plan
Reach_limit_oms_plan_content: Please upgrade now to get more OMS functions, storage & users
Access_expired_content: Your role may have changed, please reload the page to gain access. If you are still unable to access, please contact your administrator for more information.
Change_role_content: Changing a user's role will remove their OMS data. Do you want to transfer OMS data first?
If_you_want_to_assign_role_to_OMS: If you want to assign {{role}} to OMS, please assign {{role}} to My Account first.
Sign_in_with_invited_email: Sign in with invition email to continue
Delete_account_content_transfer_first: You are My Account {{role}}. Deleting your account will remove your OMS data. Do you want to transfer OMS data first?
Nfc_format_error_content: NFC card numbers only contain numbers.
Modify_your_organization_name_and_type_n: Please note that you can only modify your organization name and type once.
Email_not_found_or_password_incorrect: Email not found or your password was incorrect
How_to_find_serial_number: How to find the serial number
Check_spam_folder: If you do not receive our email, please check your spam folder:
Reach_limit_oms_plan_device_content: Please upgrade now to pair more devices.
Oms_license_expired_content: OMS {{plan}} expired on {{expiredDate}}. Unlock the full potential with a paid plan! Contact Optoma Local Partners to upgrade.
Oms_license_will_expire_content: OMS {{plan}} expires on {{expiredDate}}. To continue accessing and saving your data, please upgrade to a paid plan before then.
Oms_expired_notification: Your OMS service has expired and is no longer functioning, please contact Optoma Local Partners for upgrade options.
Oms_user_exceeded_notification: Your OMS account has exceeded the limit, please change OMS role to reach the authorized limit or contact Optoma Local Partners for upgrade options.
Oms_device_exceeded_notification: Your OMS account has exceeded the limit, please delete devices to reach the authorized limit or contact Optoma Local Partners for upgrade options.
Upgrade_oms_device_content: Your OMS device has exceeded the limit, please contact your administrator.
Grace_period_notify: Good news! As a thank you for being an early OMS customer, we are extending your trial period until January 31, 2025. Enjoy the extra time to explore our services.
Account_deleted_content: If you chose to transfer your data, it has been successfully transferred. If not, the data has been deleted.
srs_form_terms_and_conditions: I have read and agree to Optoma's terms and conditions. Please read and be aware of our privacy policy and cookie policy.
srs_form_third_party_service_centres: I have for my details to be shared with selected third party service centres who will handle my enquiry on Optoma and who will only use my details for the purpose of dealing with my enquiry.
Auto_logout_device_google_account_Desc: Automatically logout the device’s Google account when the device account is logged out.
OMS_intro1: Designed to streamline operations by monitoring, diagnosing and controlling AV displays from a single platform locally or via cloud services.
OMS_intro2: Empowering IT administrators and technicians with a comprehensive array of options to seamlessly support daily operations.
Whiteboard_intro1: Whiteboard designed to enable collaboration and interaction for physical and hybrid team co-create in real time​. A visual platform that makes it easy for teams to create, manage and stay connected.
InfoBoard_intro1: InfoBoard is an easy-to-use digital bulletin board that shows announcements, pictures, videos, and anything else you want.  Make learning fun and engaging for your students!
